{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Netgear RAX20.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AX1800 Wi-Fi 6 Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Netgear |model = RAX20 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = (5555) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AX1800 |series = Nighthawk X4 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY319200445 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM6755; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W29N02GVSIAA; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Winbond;W634GU6MB-12; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53134S; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 08:36:C9 |oui = 08:36:C9
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, MU-MIMO, VHT80, HE80 |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = NETGEARXX, NETGEARXX-5G |defaultssid_regex = ^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$,,, ^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}-5G$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = Common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/14/2019 |estreldate = 11/09/2019 |estprice = 149.99 |upc = 606449144352 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAJ7WF2A0202 |asin = B07XW27XMR |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad1ax = 574 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 1201 |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== 4-Stream Dual-Band WiFi 6 Router
{{FCC ST|02/10/2020}}
FCC Test Report documents also mention the [[Netgear RAX15]]. These two [[Property:Model|model]]s are identical and the different [[Property:Model|model]] names will be used for marketing purposes.
===Twin devices=== FCC Test Report documents for this router also mention the [[Netgear RAX15]], stating: ''These two models are identical and the different model numbers will be used for marketing purposes.''
===Power supply=== * Input: AC ~100-120V (N.A.) / ~220V (Europe/Asia) * Output: [[wikipedia:Direct current|DC]] 12V / 2.5[[wikipedia:Ampere|A]]
===Configuration interface=== * Web GUI: http://www.routerlogin.net/
===Specs=== * [https://www.broadcom.com/products/wireless/wireless-lan-infrastructure/bcm6755 Broadcom 6755] 1.5GHz Quad Core SoC * Broadcom BCM53134 Ethernet Switch * Winbond W29N02GVSIAA - 256MB Flash Memory * Winbond W634GU6MB-12 - 512MB RAM Specs from FCC documents: https://apps.fcc.gov/oetcf/eas/reports/ViewExhibitReport.cfm?mode=Exhibits&RequestTimeout=500&calledFromFrame=Y&application_id=GnLcDASmQCzu7%2F%2B9zyncKw%3D%3D&fcc_id=PY319200445
==See also== :;[https://www.netgear.com/home/wifi/routers/ Netgear] • [[Netgear RAX series|RAX series]] • [[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] • [[Broadcom]] *[[Netgear RAX10 (Nighthawk AX4)]] - AX1800 • ''Nighthawk'' (RAX10) *[[Netgear RAX20 (Nighthawk AX4)]] - AX1800 • ''Nighthawk'' (RAX20) :[[Netgear RAX15]] • [[Netgear RAX20]] • [[Netgear]] RAX35/45/50(S) *[[Netgear RAX28 (Nighthawk AX5)]] - AX2200 • ''Nighthawk'' (RAX28) *[[Netgear RAX30 (Nighthawk AX5)]] - AX2400 • ''Nighthawk'' (RAX30) *[[Netgear RAX35 (Nighthawk AX4)]] - AX3000 • ''Nighthawk'' (RAX35) *[[Netgear RAX38 (Nighthawk AX4)]] - AX3000 • ''Nighthawk'' (RAX38) *[[Netgear RAX40 (Nighthawk AX4)]] - AX3000 • ''Nighthawk'' (RAX40) *[[Netgear RAX75 (Nighthawk AX8)]] (AX5700) • ''Nighthawk'' (RAX75) *[[Netgear RAX80 (Nighthawk AX8)]] - AX6000 • ''Jaguar'' AX8 (RAX80) *[[Netgear RAX120 (Nighthawk AX12)]] - AX6000 • ''Leopard'' (RAX120) *[[Netgear RAX200 (Nighthawk Tri-Band AX12)]] - AX11000 (RAX200)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
